sentences.english: Arced lines are frequently used in Chinese-style design.
sentences.chinese: 弧形的線條在中國風的設計中運用頗多。

sentences.english: Right now, only some English sparrows and a curved-bill thrasher.
sentences.chinese: 現在只有一些英國麻雀和弧形喙的長尾鮫。

sentences.english: He curved the piece of wood.
sentences.chinese: 他把這塊木頭彎成弧形。

sentences.english: Single paneled curved horn handle with silver-tone accents.
sentences.chinese: 單鑲板的弧形角處理與銀色調的口音。

sentences.english: Sometimes a name has to be cut and the letters arranged around a curve.
sentences.chinese: 有時，一個名稱須割開，將字母配置成弧形。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo sum up the experiences of arc incision treating gluteus contracture.
sentences.chinese: 目的總結弧形小切口治療臀肌攣縮症的治療體會。

sentences.english: The skull is slightly rounded, allowing for a round and forward looking eye.
sentences.chinese: 略微圓拱，允許向眼睛方向呈圓弧形。

sentences.english: The tectonic trends in the granulite massif are arcuate.
sentences.chinese: 變粒巖地塊的構造走向是弧形。

sentences.english: The soldier looped a grenade into the enemy shelter trench.
sentences.chinese: 士兵將一枚手榴彈呈弧形拋進敵方掩蔽壕裏。

sentences.english: We took the curved-shape splint instead of the figure-of-eight splint for immobilization.
sentences.chinese: 我們採用弧形夾板取代八字肩帶的固定。

sentences.english: Segmental thrust ring absorbs all the thrust applied by internal pressure.
sentences.chinese: 弧形止推環吸收內部壓力施加的全部推力。

sentences.english: The outer surface of the guide post is in a wavy shape matched with the arc-shaped inner concave head form top to bottom.
sentences.chinese: 導柱外表面自上而下呈與弧形內凸頭配合的波浪狀。

sentences.english: The resulting image shows part of the sun's arc during those three days.
sentences.chinese: 這樣處理過的圖像顯示了那三天太陽的弧形部分。

sentences.english: Floodwaters formed a giant, arc-shaped lake on what was normally cultivated land.
sentences.chinese: 洪水在往日的耕地上形成了一個巨大的弧形湖泊。

sentences.english: A wave-shaped roof caps the facility.
sentences.chinese: 一段弧形的屋頂覆蓋了這個建築。

sentences.english: The Aleutian chain is a long arc of islands in the North Pacific.
sentences.chinese: 阿留申羣島是北太平洋上一長串呈弧形排列的小島。
